column4: Hi! I need to transfer a Very Large File (8.8 gigs) from an Ubuntu machine to a ista machine. They are connected on a wireless network, and I am computer savvy. The wireless transfer speed would take 3 hours.
My question is - how hard is it to set up a crossover ethernet connection to speed it up?
have you ever made a cat5 cable?
I have, and I have both crossover and noncrossover at hand.
